languages.text: {n}Кибелла глубоко вдыхает.{/n} "Ты... узрел{mf||а} его? Значит, что ты идешь его изгибами... со мной. Ты воистину познал{mf||а} меня, раз наши разумы коснулись друг друга". {n}Она хмурится.{/n} "Я не ждала, что транс твой будет столь глубок. Я... должна обдумать это".

traits.locale_text: {n}Кибелла глубоко вдыхает.{/n} "Ты... узрел{mf||а} лабиринт? Эним'{name}, то значит, что ты идешь его изгибами... вместе со мной". {n}Она хмурится.{/n} "Я не ждала, что транс твой будет столь глубок. Я... должна обдумать твои слова".

languages.text: {n}Kibellah takes a deep breath.{/n} "You... saw it? Then you're walking down its winding paths... together with me. You must have truly come to know me if our minds have touched so." {n}She frowns.{/n} "I did not expect your trance to extend so deeply. I... must think about this."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah atmet tief durch.{/n} "Ihr ... habt es gesehen? Dann beschreitet ihr seinen verschlungenen Pfade ... gemeinsam mit mir. Ihr müsst mich wirklich kennengelernt haben, wenn Euer Verstand den meinen derart berührt." {n}Sie runzelt die Stirn.{/n} "Ich hatte nicht erwartet, dass Eure Trance so tief reicht. Ich ... muss nachdenken."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah takes a deep breath.{/n} "You... saw it? Then you're walking down its winding paths... together with me. You must have truly come to know me if our minds have touched so." {n}She frowns.{/n} "I did not expect your trance to extend so deeply. I... must think about this."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah atmet tief druch.{/n} "Ihr ... habt es gesehen? Dann beschreitet ihr seinen verschlungenen Pfade ... gemeinsam mit mir. Ihr müsst mich wirklich kennengelernt haben, wenn Euer Verstand den meinen derart berührt." {n}Sie runzelt die Stirn.{/n} "Ich hatte nicht erwartet, dass Eure Trance so tief reicht. Ich ... muss nachdenken."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah respira hondo.{/n} «¿Lo... ha visto? Entonces recorre sus sendas sinuosas... junto a mí. Debe de haber llegado a comprenderme por completo si nuestras mentes se han tocado de esa forma». {n}Frunce el ceño.{/n} «No esperaba que su trance fuera tan profundo. Debo... meditar sobre esto».
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah takes a deep breath.{/n} "You... saw it? Then you're walking down its winding paths... together with me. You must have truly come to know me if our minds have touched so." {n}She frowns.{/n} "I did not expect your trance to extend so deeply. I... must think about this."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah respira hondo.{/n} «¿Lo... ha visto? Entonces recorre sus sendas sinuosas... junto a mí. Debe de haber llegado a comprenderme por completo si nuestras mentes se han tocado de esa forma». {n}Frunce el ceño.{/n} «No esperaba que su trance fuera tan profundo. Debo... meditar sobre esto».

languages.text: {n}キベラが深く息を吸う。{/n}「あなたも見た？なら、あなたはその曲がりくねった道を歩いていたの…私と一緒に。私たちの心が触れ合ったのなら、あなたは私を本当に理解できているはずよ」{n}彼女は顔をしかめる。{/n}「あなたのトランス状態がこんなにも深く続くとは思っていなかった…この件について考えなければ」
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah takes a deep breath.{/n} "You... saw it? Then you're walking down its winding paths... together with me. You must have truly come to know me if our minds have touched so." {n}She frowns.{/n} "I did not expect your trance to extend so deeply. I... must think about this."

traits.locale_text: {n}キベラが深く息を吸う。{/n}「あなたも見た？なら、あなたはその曲がりくねった道を歩いていたの…私と一緒に。私たちの心が触れ合ったのなら、あなたは私を本当に理解できているはずよ」{n}彼女は顔をしかめる。{/n}「あなたのトランス状態がこんなにも深く続くとは思っていなかった…この件について考えなければ」

languages.text: {n}绮贝菈深吸了一口气。{/n}“你……看到了迷宫？这意味你正走在它蜿蜒的小路上……和我一样。如果我们的心灵如此想通，那你一定是真正地了解了我。”{n}她皱起眉头。{/n}“我没想到你的沉思状态会陷得这么深，我……必须仔细考虑这个问题。”
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah takes a deep breath.{/n} "You... saw it? Then you're walking down its winding paths... together with me. You must have truly come to know me if our minds have touched so." {n}She frowns.{/n} "I did not expect your trance to extend so deeply. I... must think about this."

traits.locale_text: {n}绮贝菈深吸了一口气。{/n}“你……看到了迷宫？这意味你正走在它蜿蜒的小路上……和我一样。如果我们的心灵如此想通，那你一定是真正地了解了我。”{n}她皱起眉头。{/n}“我没想到你的沉思状态会陷得这么深，我……必须仔细考虑这个问题。”

languages.text: {n}Kibellah inspire profondément.{/n} « Vous... l'avez vu ? Cela signifie que vous empruntez ses chemins sinueux... à mes côtés. Si nos esprits se sont touchés de la sorte, c'est que vous me connaissez réellement. » {n}Elle fronce les sourcils.{/n} « Je ne m'attendais pas à ce que votre transe s'étende aussi loin. Je dois... réfléchir à ce qu'il s'est passé. »
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah takes a deep breath.{/n} "You... saw it? Then you're walking down its winding paths... together with me. You must have truly come to know me if our minds have touched so." {n}She frowns.{/n} "I did not expect your trance to extend so deeply. I... must think about this."

Je dois... réfléchir à ce qu'il s'est passé. »

languages.text: {n}Kibellah derin bir nefes alıyor.{/n} "Onu... Gördün mü? O hâlde benimle birlikte... Labirentin dolambaçlı yollarından yürüyordun. Zihinlerimiz birbirine böylesine yaklaştıysa beni hakikaten tanımaya başlamış olmalısın." {n}Kaşlarını çatıyor.{/n} "Transın bu kadar derinlere yayılmasını beklemiyordum. Benim... Bu hususta düşünmem gerek."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah takes a deep breath.{/n} "You... saw it? Then you're walking down its winding paths... together with me. You must have truly come to know me if our minds have touched so." {n}She frowns.{/n} "I did not expect your trance to extend so deeply. I... must think about this."
